languages.text: Весь переход я провел в погруженном во тьму отсеке астропатического хора, по которому в молчании ходили аколиты корабельного хирурга. Пропевая литургию исцеления, они шествовали между псайкеров, введенных медикаментами в беспамятство, и успокаивали всякого, пробудившегося с воем ужаса, ударами электрических дубинок.

traits.locale_text: Весь переход я провел в погруженном во тьму отсеке астропатического хора, по которому в молчании ходили аколиты Корабельного хирурга. Пропевая литургию исцеления, они шествовали между введенных медикаментами в беспамятство псайкеров и успокаивали всякого, пробудившегося с воем ужаса, ударами электрических дубинок.

languages.text: I spent the entire jump in the murky depths of the Astropathic Choir bay, where acolytes of the ship's surgeon walked back and forth in silence. After singing the healing liturgy from beginning to end, they marched among the psykers, who had been medicated into unconsciousness. Any psyker who awoke, often with howls of horror, was quickly pacified with a sharp jab from an electrified baton.
languages.original_text: Весь переход я провел в погруженном во тьму отсеке астропатического хора, по которому в молчании ходили аколиты корабельного хирурга. Пропевая литургию исцеления, они шествовали между псайкеров, введенных медикаментами в беспамятство, и успокаивали всякого, пробудившегося с воем ужаса, ударами электрических дубинок.

traits.locale_text: I spent the entire passage in the murky depths of the astropathic choir section, where acolytes of the ship's surgeon walked back and forth in silence. After singing the healing liturgy from beginning to end, they marched among the psykers, who had been medicated into unconsciousness. Any psyker who awoke, often with howls of horror, was quickly pacified with a sharp jab from an electrified baton.

Any psyker who awoke, often with howls of horror, was quickly pacified with a sharp jab from an electrified baton.

Any psyker who awoke, often with howls of horror, was quickly pacified with a sharp jab from an electrified baton.

I spent the entire passage in the murky depths of the Astropathic Choir section, where acolytes of the ship's surgeon walked back and forth in silence. After singing the healing liturgy from beginning to end, they marched among the psykers, who had been medicated into unconsciousness. Any psyker who awoke, often with howls of horror, was quickly pacified with a sharp jab from an electrified baton.

languages.text: Me pasé el salto entero en las profundidades del Coro de Astrópatas, en el que los acólitos del cirujano andaban en el más absoluto silencio. Tras entonar la liturgia sanadora de principio a fin, caminaron entre los psíquicos sedados por la medicación. Cualquier psíquico que despertara, por lo general entre gritos aterrados, era rápidamente silenciado con un bastón eléctrico.
languages.original_text: I spent the entire jump in the murky depths of the Astropathic Choir bay, where acolytes of the ship's surgeon walked back and forth in silence. After singing the healing liturgy from beginning to end, they marched among the psykers, who had been medicated into unconsciousness. Any psyker who awoke, often with howls of horror, was quickly pacified with a sharp jab from an electrified baton.

traits.locale_text: Me pasé la travesía entera en las profundidades del coro de astrópatas, en el que los acólitos del cirujano andaban en el más absoluto silencio. Tras entonar la liturgia sanadora de principio a fin, caminaron entre los psíquicos sedados por la medicación. Cualquier psíquico que despertara, por lo general entre gritos aterrados, era rápidamente silenciado con un bastón eléctrico.

languages.text: 整场旅行期间，我都躲在星语唱诗班阴暗的深处。船医的侍仆们在一片寂静中默默巡视。当结束了治愈性的颂唱仪式之后，那些侍仆们走向了被药物麻醉、不省人事的灵能者们。每当有哪个灵能者醒来，通常还伴有惊恐的嚎叫声时，那个人就会马上被电棍猛戳一下，再次陷入沉寂之中。
languages.original_text: I spent the entire jump in the murky depths of the Astropathic Choir bay, where acolytes of the ship's surgeon walked back and forth in silence. After singing the healing liturgy from beginning to end, they marched among the psykers, who had been medicated into unconsciousness. Any psyker who awoke, often with howls of horror, was quickly pacified with a sharp jab from an electrified baton.

traits.locale_text: 整场旅行期间，我都躲在星语唱诗班阴暗的深处。船医的侍仆们在一片寂静中默默巡视。当结束了治愈性的颂唱仪式之后，那些侍仆们走向了被药物麻醉、不省人事的灵能者们。每当有哪个灵能者醒来，通常还伴有惊恐的嚎叫声时，那个人就会马上被电棍猛戳一下，再次陷入沉寂之中。

languages.text: ジャンプ中、感応通信聖歌隊ベイの薄暗い奥底の通路で過ごしていた。そこでは、船の医師のアコライトが何も話さず行ったり来たりしていた。癒しの典礼を初めから終わりまで歌うと、薬を投与されて意識を失った異能者達の間を行進した。目を覚ました異能者は、たまに恐怖で雄叫びを上げるものの、電気の通った警棒で一突きで、すぐに大人しくさせられていた。
languages.original_text: I spent the entire jump in the murky depths of the Astropathic Choir bay, where acolytes of the ship's surgeon walked back and forth in silence. After singing the healing liturgy from beginning to end, they marched among the psykers, who had been medicated into unconsciousness. Any psyker who awoke, often with howls of horror, was quickly pacified with a sharp jab from an electrified baton.

traits.locale_text: ジャンプ中、感応通信聖歌隊ベイの薄暗い奥底の通路で過ごしていた。そこでは、船の医師のアコライトが何も話さず行ったり来たりしていた。癒しの典礼を初めから終わりまで歌うと、薬を投与されて意識を失った異能者達の間を行進した。目を覚ました異能者は、たまに恐怖で雄叫びを上げるものの、電気の通った警棒で一突きで、すぐに大人しくさせられていた。

languages.text: Ich habe den gesamten Sprung in den trüben Tiefen der Abteilung des Astropathischen Chors verbracht, wo Akolythen des Schiffschirurgen schweigend auf und ab gingen. Nachdem sie die Liturgie der Heilung von Anfang bis Ende gesungen hatten, begaben sie sich zu den Psionikern, die durch Medikamente bewusstlos gemacht worden waren. Jeder Psioniker, der erwachte, oft mit angsterfüllten Schreien, wurde durch einen schnellen Schlag mit einem Stromstock rasch beruhigt.
languages.original_text: I spent the entire jump in the murky depths of the Astropathic Choir bay, where acolytes of the ship's surgeon walked back and forth in silence. After singing the healing liturgy from beginning to end, they marched among the psykers, who had been medicated into unconsciousness. Any psyker who awoke, often with howls of horror, was quickly pacified with a sharp jab from an electrified baton.

languages.text: J'ai passé toute la traversée dans les profondeurs obscures du chœur astropathique, dans lequel les acolytes du chirurgien du vaisseau s'affairaient en silence. Après avoir chanté la liturgie de guérison dans son intégralité, ils ont déambulé parmi les psykers qui avaient été plongés dans un sommeil artificiel. Dès que l'un d'entre eux se réveillait, le plus souvent en hurlant de terreur, il était rapidement assommé à l'aide d'une matraque électrique.
languages.original_text: I spent the entire jump in the murky depths of the Astropathic Choir bay, where acolytes of the ship's surgeon walked back and forth in silence. After singing the healing liturgy from beginning to end, they marched among the psykers, who had been medicated into unconsciousness. Any psyker who awoke, often with howls of horror, was quickly pacified with a sharp jab from an electrified baton.

traits.locale_text: J'ai passé toute la traversée dans les profondeurs obscures du chœur astropathique, dans lequel les acolytes du chirurgien du vaisseau s'affairaient en silence. Après avoir chanté la liturgie de guérison dans son intégralité, ils ont déambulé parmi les psykers qui avaient été plongés dans un sommeil artificiel. Dès que l'un d'entre eux se réveillait, le plus souvent en hurlant de terreur, il était rapidement assommé à l'aide d'une matraque électrique.

languages.text: Bütün sıçrama sürecini, gemi cerrahının havarilerinin sessizlik içinde volta attığı Astropatik Koro bölmesinin kasvetli derinliklerinde geçirdim. Havariler, şifa ilahilerini baştan sona okumalarının ardından, aldıkları ilaçlarla bilinçlerini yitirmiş ruhsezerlerin arasında dolanmaya başladı. Uyanan ruhsezerler sıklıkla dehşetle bağırıyor ve elektrikli bir copun sert darbesiyle kısa sürede tekrar kendilerinden geçiyordu.
languages.original_text: I spent the entire jump in the murky depths of the Astropathic Choir bay, where acolytes of the ship's surgeon walked back and forth in silence. After singing the healing liturgy from beginning to end, they marched among the psykers, who had been medicated into unconsciousness. Any psyker who awoke, often with howls of horror, was quickly pacified with a sharp jab from an electrified baton.
